climbs.name: Idealistic Freshman Working Toward a 4.0 While Triple Majoring and Double Minoring

content.description: Begin on the south face of the east wing, just inside the benches (the wall should only be ~3 feet high here) and traverse towards the fountain itself. Use the very edge of the lip for hands until it's no longer convenient, then cross the gap, and continue onward to the other end of the wing, right next to the fountain.
content.location: South face of east wing (Face towards ME building, wing points to MSEE)

content.description: The route follows ENGR 13100 in reverse: Begin on the west face of the south wing, right next to the fountain itself. Traverse right across diagonal pinches and decent footholds, then cross the gap, and continue onward to the other end of the wing, just inside the benches. Grab the lip of the outer portion of the wing - only the very edge - once it's convenient to do so.
content.location: West face of south wing (Face towards Hovde, wing points to ME building)

content.description: Begin on the west face of the south wing, just inside the benches (the wall should only be ~3 feet high here) and traverse towards the fountain itself. Use the very edge of the lip for hands until it's no longer convenient, then switch to pulling on diagonal pinches. Cross the gap, and continue onward to the other end of the wing, right next to the fountain.
content.location: West face of south wing (Face towards Hovde, wing points to ME building)

climbs.name: Cynical Senior Leaving With a 2.7 After Dropping Two Minors, Two Majors, and Changing the Last Major

content.description: The route follows Idealistic Freshman in reverse: Begin on the south face of the east wing, right next to the fountain itself. Traverse right, then cross the gap, and continue onward to the other end of the wing, just inside the benches. Grab the lip of the outer portion of the wing - only the very edge - once it's convenient to do so.
content.location: South face of east wing (Face towards ME building, wing points to MSEE)

content.description: Climb the south face of the east wing. Use the squares incur to the wall, go till they become shallow, and if you're ballsy, top out.
content.location: South face of east wing (Face towards ME building, wing points to MSEE)

content.description: The Engineering Fountain has many great lines. In center of campus so watch for others who may not approve
